channel.title: Need to link fourms with server help?
channel.description: Well i have a server and a client and fourms, but i need to know how to make it to where you have to signup on fourms to be able to log into the server. can anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2009, 01:26:21 pm[/size][hr]help please?
